entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` breaks build of ordinary csproj projects #42433
  • CORS policy.AllowAnyHeader() does not appear to work #42424

Closed

  • After updating .NET 8.0.304 SDK to .NET 8.0.400 SDK, running dotnet workload update failed to update workload manifests #42390

PullRequests

Created

  • Create a transport package for VS and VS authoring for analyzers #42451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try to bring back formerly flaky test #42450
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor artifacts size tests #42447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find baseline workload set in 8.0.100 folder #42435
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Add false positive license scan to exclusions list #42434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable package source mapping for workload * commands #42373
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.9
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
